title: Anchovy tapenade
ingredients: ['1 clove garlic, chopped', '400g (14 oz) whole, pitted kalamata olives', '1 (50g) tin anchovy fillets, rinsed', '2 tablespoons capers', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary', '3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil']
